refnamediv.refpurpose: ensure source IP and source MAC address match

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Any mac commands will affect all traffic destined for the firewall host, or to be forwarded by the host. They must be declared before the first router or interface.

note.para: There is also a mac parameter which allows matching MAC addresses within individual rules (see ).

refsect1.para: The mac helper command DROPs traffic from any IP address that was not sent using the macaddr specified.
When packets are dropped, a log is produced with the label "MAC MISSMATCH" (sic.). mac obeys the default log limits (see in ).

note.para: This command restricts an IP to a particular MAC address. The same MAC address is permitted send traffic with a different IP.
